description:
The Business Strategy & Operations organization provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with effective day-to-day operations, and help evolve early stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.

As a Business Operations Manager, you will be responsible for operating the partner facing aspects of our business. Your responsibilities will include developing a strategy to efficiently scale operations related to payments, reporting, data collection and other aspects of the partner facing business, inform the product roadmap as business systems are developed, communicate business growth updates to partners, scale monthly/quarterly payments and design monthly reports. You will work with cross-functional teams, including Business Development, Strategy and Operations, Marketing, Product Management, Legal, Finance and Engineering.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • Experience in leading business operations as a Revenue Operations Manager, Finance Operations/Business Analyst or similar role.
  • Experience working at a technology company.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in management consulting, finance or accounting.
  • Systems integration experience.
  • Familiarity with the advertising industry.
  • Demonstrated ability to lead and manage large cross-functional working groups.
responsibilities:
• Design, manage and implement initiatives to improve governance around partner operational processes and systems.
  • Drive processes through the entire product lifecycle from startup to scale.
  • Drive structured, recurring reviews of business metrics against stated objectives.
  • Manage monthly partner payment calculations and payment delivery.
  • Partner with cross-functional teams to define a long term strategic plan for the Next Billion Users (NBU) business.
title: Business Operations Manager
